blockquote.quote: Started from the bottom now the whole team here, nigga.
blockquote.author: Drake

blockquote.quote: Me and my friends we got money to spend.
blockquote.author: Drake

blockquote.quote: Fuck bitches, get money fuck niggaz, get money
blockquote.author: Junior M.A.F.I.A.

blockquote.quote: Women lie, men lie, numbers don't lie!
blockquote.author: Yo Gotti

blockquote.quote: Let’s toast to the fact that I’ve moved out my mama’s basement.
blockquote.author: Drake

blockquote.quote: I live Thug Life and let the money come to me
blockquote.author: Tupac Shakur
